original_title: 女教師玩具化計画 白峰ミウ
overview: Haruka is leading a busy life at an important time when her students decide their careers. In the midst of this, there is one student who is worried about... Makita was in a daze during class, his grades plummeted, and the school he wanted was an E grade. Makita mutters, "It's your fault." ……And then one night, when Haruka is heading home after finishing her overtime work, she is suddenly attacked by Makita, who has been waiting for her...
title: Female Teacher Toying Project – Miu Shiramine
